Edit Description Dialog Box

Requires: Full Development System

Select File»Description in the Fuzzy System Designer to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to specify a description for the fuzzy system you design in the Fuzzy System Designer. When you select File»Create HTML Report to create an HTML report for the fuzzy system, the HTML report includes the description you specify in this dialog box.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Description—Specifies a description for the fuzzy system.
